Title: Prohibits the retrospective denial of payment for substance use disorder treatment services
Summary: Prohibits the retrospective denial of payment for substance use disorder treatment services if an insured was covered for such services at the time treatment was initiated; requires insurers to notify a treatment provider when an insured has lost coverage based on termination of the insured's employment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting the retrospective denial of payment for substance use disorder treatment services
